new_skill_specs.name: analyze_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze the diagram to identify and count specified entities.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with counts of specified entities.

tests.input: {"image_hash": "d7c548b2c54a", "entities": ["tiny gray bicycles", "brown metal sedan", "tiny green bicycle"]}
tests.expect: {"tiny gray bicycles": 3, "brown metal sedan": 1, "tiny green bicycle": 1}

new_skill_specs.name: compare_counts
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare two counts and map the result to a multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A string representing the selected multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: One or both counts are zero.
